bad_key: The key could not be read
big_xdr: xdr does not fit in the message. you can only send
check_here: Everything seems to be successful, check here - {}
choose_protect:
Select the options for protecting the 
 
 PIN key, the numeric keypad will be shown at each operation (recommended) 
 
 Password. You will need to send a password of any letters and numbers (In development) 
 
 Without password. You will not need to specify a password.
choose_token_swap2: Select the token you want to exchange your {} for
confirm_activate: The account does not exist, if you want to activate the address {} with the sum {} XLM, click yes
confirm_asset: Do you want to open trust line to {} {} ?
confirm_close_asset: Do you want to close the trust line to {} {} ?
create_msg:
If you have a wallet, you can enter a private key and use your wallet in this bot. You can also specify a pincode and the key will be stored in encrypted form. If you lose the pincode, you will not be able to use your wallet. 
 
 You can also create a free wallet, but only MTL and EURMTL tokens will be available in it. If you do not use the free wallet for more than six months, the administration reserves the right to delete your account.
delete_asset: Select the mode to add/remove the token
delete_asset2: Select the trust line to delete. The entire balance of this token will be destroyed!
have_all: You have already opened all approved trust lines
max_wallets: You have the maximum number of free wallets
only_3: Only 3 trust lines are possible in a free account
open_asset: Select a trust line to open
resend: Attempting to resend the transaction to the blockchain. Please, wait up to 5 minutes.
send_address:
Send the recipient's address 
 (either a federal or a full address) 
 you can also use a QRcode with the address 
 or a telegram username using @
send_code: Enter the new asset code, for example MTL
send_error2: The wallet could not be found or is not activated
send_issuer: Enter the issuer's address, for example {}
send_key: Enter your private key (expert mod: private key + space + public key)
send_sum: Enter the amount of {} to send. Now it is available: {}
send_sum_swap: Enter the amount of {} to exchange Now it is available: {}. The tokens will be exchanged for {} Look all order ({})
send_xdr: Send your xdr transaction to sign or link at eurmtl.me
setting_msg: Setting up wallets, here you can choose a default wallet, add a new one, change the pin or delete the wallet
try_send: Successfully signed, trying to send to the blockchain, waiting up to 5 minutes
wallet_setting_msg: Wallet setup, here you can add a trust line (asset), get your private key for backup, delete the pin or install a new one. To change the pin, delete the old one.
confirm_sale:
Do you want to sell {} {} 
 for {} {} ?
load_error: Loading error, please choose or create another wallet
veche_ask: You are trying to enter the Veche. Your public key will be transferred. The message will be signed with your key. Are you sure?
mtl_tools_msg: Here you tools that can help you
delegate_start:
Now you delegate to {} 
 Choose action
delegate_send_address: Send address to delegate your vote
delegate_delete: Do you want delete delegate from {} ?
donate_show: Now you donate for this address
donate_send: Send an address to donate to
donate_name: Send a name for the donation (please use latin words, for example a telegram username)
donate_persent: Send your donation's value in percentage
donate_end: You will donate to {} percent {} address {}
donate_delete: Do you want to delete donation from {} ?
show_bim: Here you can see who is in your BIM. You can add a new receiver if you are a guardian
send_bim_address: Send an address to add a BIM receiver
send_bim_name: Send the BIM receiver's name (please use latin words, for example a telegram username)
add_bim_end: You will add BIM to {} address {}
delete_bim: Do you want delete {} from BIM ?
add_read_only:
Add a read only address. For xdr generation only. Please note that if you dont have the private key and somebody sends tokens to you, you will lose them. 
 Please send your public address
delete_sale:
Do you want delete offer: sale {} {} 
 for {} {} ?
set_default:
You can specify the address to which all transfers sent to your username will be sent by default. If nothing is specified, the transfers will go to the active address. 
 The address is currently set : 
 {} 

 If you want to change the address, send a new address. To delete, send any letter. To exit, press the button 'return'.
inout: Here you can make a deposit or withdrawal to other networks. Currently, it's USDT on the TRC20 network. And soon, Bitcoin on lightning.
inout_usdt:
Here you can convert your USDT TRC20 to USDM on the Stellar network. Please carefully review fees and restrictions!
Select operation.
usdm_need: You need to have an open line to USDM!
usdt_in: Fee for deposit is ${}. Minimum amount is ${} and the maximum amount is ${}. Cents will be rounded off. Do not send amounts larger or smaller than stated, as you may lose your funds! You must have an open line to USDM! If you agree to the conditions, send the amount to the address {}. After sending, click the Check button. The transfer must be made in a single transaction
usdt_out: Fee for withdrawal is $1-$5. Minimum amount is ${} and the maximum amount is ${}. Cents will be rounded off. Do not send amounts larger or smaller than stated, as you may lose your funds! If you agree to the conditions, please send the address on the TRON network. We do not recommend using exchange addresses, it is better to use personal wallets. How to calculate commission
btc_in:
Purchase SATSMTL with a variety of other cryptocurrencies. 
You must have an open trustline to SATSMTL! 
Conversion fee is {}% 
Maximum amount is {} sats, minimum amount is {} sats. 
You will have to pay the invoice within 30 minutes. 
If you agree with the terms, send the amount of SATSMTL you want to receive
btc_in_2: You have placed an order {} it is valid until {} After payment, press Check
inout_btc:
Here you can convert your BTC (and other cryptocurrencies) to SATSMTL in the Stellar network. 

Please carefully review the fees and restrictions! Choose the operation.
address_book:
In this section, you can add or delete entries in the address book.

To add an entry, send the text in the format 'Address Name' (separated by a space and without quotes).

The address can be in any format: it could be a public key, a federal address, or a Telegram username.
send_cheque_sum: Please send the amount in EURMTL to create a cheque. In case of multiple recipients, the specified amount will be sent to each.
send_cheque_count: Please send the number of people who will be able to receive this cheque and this amount.
send_cheque_comment: Please send a comment, it will be displayed on the cheque.
send_cheque:
You are creating a cheque for {} EURMTL, for {} recipient(s), total amount {} 

 with the comment "{}".
bad_cheque: Cheque not found. It may have been cashed or cancelled
try_send2: Attempting to send the transaction to the blockchain. This process may take up to 5 minutes, please wait.
send_good_cheque: Transaction has been successfully sent to the blockchain, the cheque has been paid out.

A trade has been executed from the account {}:

info_debit:

Do you want to exchange 

 {} {} -> {} {} ? 

 Attention, the operation is carried out on a decentralized exchange. Execution of this operation cannot be canceled. Make sure all the figures are correct!
confirm_cancel_offers: This operation will also cancel all sale offers for {}
swap_summ_blocked_by_offers: Attention! You have offers that affect the token you have chosen to exchange. The blocked amount is {} {}. You can cancel offers by using the button below.
send_summ_blocked_by_offers: Attention! You have offers that affect the token you have chosen to send. The blocked amount is {} {}. You can cancel offers by using the button below.
limits: Attention! Here, you can remove the 5000 limit. Please handle your token with care; actions committed to the blockchain are irreversible.
need_update_limits: Attention! You cannot perform operations exceeding 5000 due to the limit set in settings. Please visit settings to adjust this limit.
swap_alert: Attention! This is a high-risk transaction. Review the data carefully. The market might lack the necessary volume. Only proceed if you are completely certain!
low_xlm: You have less than 0.5 free XLM
delegate_ready: If you want to be on the Council send ready
mtlap_tools_text:
The Assembly is the supreme body of the Association that makes decisions through liquid democracy and manages key aspects of operations.

The Council is the executive body that implements the decisions of the Meeting and manages administrative functions. For example managing the multi-signature.
